#summary mailTo(emailAddress[encode,name])
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

*Description*:

Creates a mailto link tag to the specified email address, which is also used as the name of the link unless name is specified.

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *emailAddress* || string || true ||  || The email address to link to. ||
|| *encode* || boolean || false || false || Pass true here to encode the email address, making it harder for bots to harvest it. ||
|| *name* || string || false ||  || A string to use as the link text ('Joe' or 'Support Department' for example) ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#mailTo("support@mysite.com")#
}}}

{{{
#mailTo(emailAddress="support@mysite.com", name="Website Support", encode=true)#

}}}
